The '''Depths of Mt. Yougou''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a location beneath [[Mt. Yougou]]. Follow the questline for [[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]] and defeat the [["Miasmic Tumor"]] to gain access to this location.
